channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: Diane Noomin, Who Helped Bring Feminism to Underground Comics, Dies at 75. https://t.co/yuXRGUeNcX
item.source:markdown: Diane Noomin, Who Helped Bring Feminism to Underground Comics, Dies at 75. https://t.co/yuXRGUeNcX

item.description: @AnthonyMSG I think the players decided to help the fans re-accept him. They understand the humanity of the athletes. The fans abstract their humanity, objectify them to the nth degree.
item.source:markdown: @AnthonyMSG I think the players decided to help the fans re-accept him. They understand the humanity of the athletes. The fans abstract their humanity, objectify them to the nth degree.

item.description: @junethomas Good idea. We should be able to program that ourselves.
item.source:markdown: @junethomas Good idea. We should be able to program that ourselves.

item.description:
Trump is responsible for over a million American deaths. He knew how deadly the virus is, and did nothing to protect the country. Yes, he must be punished for trying to overthrow the government, but don't forget all the American death and suffering he's responsible for.

Today we commemorate a horrific event 21 years ago.

The pandemic is orders of magnitude more devastating than that event. And it's ongoing. It's still killing massive numbers of people and destroying lives.
item.source:markdown:
Trump is responsible for over a million American deaths. He knew how deadly the virus is, and did nothing to protect the country. Yes, he must be punished for trying to overthrow the government, but don't forget all the American death and suffering he's responsible for.
Today we commemorate a horrific event 21 years ago.
The pandemic is orders of magnitude more devastating than that event. And it's ongoing. It's still killing massive numbers of people and destroying lives.

item.description:
I can't believe journalism didn't get how huge the Dobbs decision was sooner.

We still have this right to choose. #fornow https://t.co/YlQT5Y0pYc

item.description:
Are there any good baseball newsletters on substack?

Any links much appreciated (and will be part of my new baseball news product).

item.description:
I have a regex that strips all HTML elements from a string. Now I want one that does less, it strips all markup except <p> and </p>. Then I want one that takes a list of elements it should leave in place. Any help most appreciated!

https://t.co/DS5ppWeUHM
item.source:markdown:
I have a regex that strips all HTML elements from a string. Now I want one that does less, it strips all markup except <p> and </p>. Then I want one that takes a list of elements it should leave in place. Any help most appreciated!
https://t.co/DS5ppWeUHM
